minigame

Class Cards

  • java.lang.Object
    • minigame.Cards
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MiniGame_H

    public class Cards
extends java.lang.Object
implements MiniGame_H
    The Cards class implements the MiniGame_H interface and represents a card-based mini-game. It manages the game state, drawing of cards, and user interactions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Cards(GameRun var1)
      Constructs a new Cards instance with the specified GameRun object.
